Name: scprime
Overview: ScPrime is a cryptocurrency project targeting public cloud services with a blockchain based ecosystem to pay individuals to store data around the globe using smart contracts and cryptographic proofs to ensure accuracy, security and redundancy.

walletpassword.Name: Wallet Password
walletpassword.Description: Enter your password to automatically unlock your wallet when the docker starts.<br><b>NOTE:</b> Your default password is your seed phrase unless changed.

metadata.Name: Metadata
metadata.Description: Location where metadata is stored including consensus, wallets and file contracts. 100Gb of free space is recommended, SSD preferred.<br>Container Path: /scp-data

storage.Name: Storage
storage.Description: Path where shared folders are located.<br>Container Path: /storage

port1.Name: Port 1
port1.Description: Open this port in your firewall and forward to your server.

port2.Name: Port 2
port2.Description: Open this port in your firewall and forward to your server.

port3.Name: Port 3
port3.Description: Open this port in your firewall and forward to your server.
